definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: To use a china cup than a paper cup because it can be used again.
sentences.chinese: 用陶瓷杯比用纸杯好，因为它可以重复使用。

sentences.english: She presents a tray with small paper cups filled with medication.
sentences.chinese: 她托着一个医护托盘，上面的小纸杯内装着药品。

sentences.english: In the morning, I get a board cup at lobby and prepare some water from there for my class.
sentences.chinese: 早晨，我从大厅拿到了一个的纸杯备了些水去教室。

sentences.english: You don't want your typical mounded cupcake.
sentences.chinese: 你是不想看到像山墩那样的纸杯蛋糕的。

sentences.english: Cupcakes designed to look like characters from the Muppet Show.
sentences.chinese: 设计成《大青蛙布偶秀》里的角色的纸杯蛋糕。

sentences.english: Liquid nitrogen ice cream and cupcakes.
sentences.chinese: 液态氮冰淇淋和纸杯蛋糕。

sentences.english: Words are flowing out like endless rain into a paper cup.
sentences.chinese: 闲言碎语如连绵的雨点般渗透纸杯。

sentences.english: This paper presents a device and procedure for ultrasonic welding of paper cups.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种超声纸杯焊接设备及焊接工艺。

sentences.english: So I pretty much forced him to come down and buy a cupcake.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我几乎是逼着他下来买个纸杯蛋糕。

sentences.english: Amazing cupcakes inspired by Super Mario Bros video games.
sentences.chinese: 依据“超级玛丽”电子游戏设想的冷艳的纸杯蛋糕。

sentences.english: s themed birthday cupcakes made by Cupcakes Nouveau.
sentences.chinese: 这是由新式纸杯蛋糕制作的80后主题的生日蛋糕。

sentences.english: So we used as many of those chocolate cupcakes as we could.
sentences.chinese: 所以我至少能做的是吸引一堆人来买纸杯蛋糕。

sentences.english: Unusual cupcakes designed for Medical Examiner in San Diego.
sentences.chinese: 这是为圣地亚哥的法医特别设计的纸杯蛋糕。

sentences.english: Don't bring the plastic tub of margarine or sticks of butter to the table.
sentences.chinese: 千万别把纸杯代黄油或很多块白脱放到桌上。

sentences.english: Stick the cup and the lid together with the tape.
sentences.chinese: 用胶带把纸杯和午餐盒盖子粘在一起。
